tests.text: You should make use of the existing * selector.
tests.testString:
// Two selectors create two CSSStyleRule objects
assert.equal(new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyleDeclarations('*').length, 1);

description: Also add a box-sizing of border-box to everything. This will make it so the border you added doesn't add any size to your elements.
